about_the_game:
This is a Sokoban casual game. Players need to control the male character to move to the female character to complete the task and enter the next level. However, there will be many holes in the process. At this time, the boy needs to push the square to fill the hole. To pass.
The ingenious design and exquisite character stand-up drawing make the players happy to think. Hurry up and use your brains to rescue the trapped girl.
When you find and collect all the characters, you can unlock this DLC nude. The DLC includes 8 naked girls And 2 sexy girls.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some pornography, 
all characters are over 18 years old
